TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1605

barker_notes.barker_summary: Bill for military transportation, February 22, 1827. Jesse Thompson to Ahumada.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1605

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Bill for military transportation, February 22, 1827. Jesse Thompson to Ahumada.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Colonel Mateo Ahumada*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Jesse Thompson Dr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827 */date_mentioned*To the Services of 2 teams 34 days from the *date_mentioned n="01-20-1827">20 January*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="02-24-1827">22d.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-xx-1827">february */date_mentioned*inclusive on Government Service at $12 per day_____$408.00*/p*
*p*To 12 days allowed for the return of my teams to the *location_mentioned*Brazos */location_mentioned*per Contract at 12$_________________________________________$144. 00*/p*
*p*$552. 00*/p* *p*Cr. By Cash____________________________________________________ 30.00*/p*
*p*Balance due______________________________________________$522. 00*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jesse B. Thompson*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*/div1*
